column1: I am from St Louis Missouri born and raised yes
I've been here a couple times I just recently moved back 2 months ago
I take care of a good friend is who who's ill
I jumped right back on the bandwagon
I'm sure you can tell by my shoes
the road maps following a road map may be driving myself
but we just recently got back from Colorado
what happened to the mountains so that the snow and enjoy the little fine dining
I actually going horseback riding through the Royal Gorge
I listen to jazz music and I also draw
I've probably mastered controlling my temper through age
it would have been my husband and it was about financial issues
and ensure unstable I don't like loud talking or loud emotion I like to sit in methodically and logically talk about things not raise my voice
most recently with the illness of my friend I wish I would have handled his sister a little differently as far as things that she's wanted me to do that I really needed to tell her
the way they really needed to be done I took her advice where I shouldn't have

we I was engaged to him 15 years ago and he recently called me I guess about five years ago and told me he was diagnosed with cancer we've always maintained our friendship and I asked my husband if I could go help him in this time of need and I'm here
a lot of things one he's a good friend of mine and his sister moved out here as well to my son wanted to start his career out here 3 I love the weather
and that's all I can think of at the moment
I would be the the death of my youngest son

can you tell me about that I don't know where to start as far as he was born premature and since he was born so early I had him in 5 months versus 9 the we we made the decision to take him off life support cuz he wasn't getting any better so that would have been the the hardest decision I made with my husband
I really don't want to erase anything from my memory
I've actually learn and experience and gain knowledge from from things that happen so I'm not I'm not one to put things erase things out of my mind I categorize them
that's very close lost my mother at a young age and Ava siblings and my father still remain very close

always very health-conscious very energetic and exercises and has a spirituality about him that I want to have as well the contentment that he that he portrays that I that I would like to have as well
very confused or skittish I guess would be the word
lately fine except for the fact that my good friend who I'm helping take care of we just got out of the hospital so it's been a little hectic the last 2 days
with good friends and good company I should say and
I just got back from a concert so it was outside it was enjoyable music I was with good friends we ate well and enjoy the moment
I can't think of anything that would want to change except for maybe exercise a little more
not trying to accomplish everything at once
then I went into college have some college in mathematics and finance
I like to enjoy good food nice Wine & Company I just went last night to very nice Italian restaurant was in the company of good friends and family and we dined and talked and that was fun
most proud of I guess it would be my children
